nueva_mission: Our school community inspires passion for lifelong learning, fosters social and emotional acuity, and develops the studentâ€™s imaginative mind.
nueva_vision: The Nueva School uses a dynamic educational model to enable gifted students to learn how to make choices that will benefit the world.
nueva_info: Nueva is a student-centered school known for its distinctive inquiry-based interdisciplinary studies, constructivist project-based learning, and its pioneering work in social emotional learning and design thinking. The school also offers specialist teachers in numerous other core and elective areas, including STEM, writing, the arts, entrepreneurship, and physical education.
